name: Leashed Soul
storyline: Once upon a time Beydo, the boy – who is a wooden doll – got a gift from Mother Nature. He's got the best gift that a wooden doll can get. The gift of a real life... When he realized that he lives, he started a quest. His quest was to give as many life as he could give during his short life....and this is the point where the story begins....
summary: Leashed Soul is a strange combination of the popular puzzle games, with emotional power and narrative gameplay.
